text:
Typically, the user who
posted a story to Instagram
is able to see who viewed it.
But here are two ways
to view an Instagram story anonymously.
Using an Instagram account

that isn't automatically
identifiable as you
might be the best way to stay anonymous.
If you already have an account,

you can easily add another
and switch between the two.

Tap on your profile name
and then "Add account."
Tap "Create New Account."
Follow the prompts to set up an account,

and make sure your username
and profile picture
doesn't include your name or face.
Signed in to your new account,
view the Instagram story,

and the person will only
see the new account details.
The caveat here is that the account

you want to view the
story on must be public,

or else they'll have
to add your new account
as a friend to grant you access.
You can turn airplane mode on

just before viewing a story
to enable anonymous viewing.
Connected to the internet,

go to the profile whose
story you want to watch.
Turn on airplane mode.
Now tap to view the story.
